Symmetric - Class in nsgl.real.random
Title: Symmetric
Symmetric() - Constructor for class nsgl.real.random.Symmetric
Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with a side probability of 0.5 and a [0,1) uniform distribution, i.e., this distribution will generate uniform real numbers in the interval (-1, 1)
Symmetric(Random) - Constructor for class nsgl.real.random.Symmetric
